instructions: Tap the Compose button . Tap in the email, then type your message. With the onscreen keyboard, you can tap individual keys or slide your finger from one letter to the next to type without lifting your finger. (See Enter text using the onscreen keyboard .) To change the formatting, tap the Expand Toolbar button in the format bar above the keyboard, then tap the Text Styles button . You can change the font style, change the color of text, use a bold or italic stye, add a bulleted or numbered list, and more.

Tap in the email, tap the Reply button , then tap Reply. Type your response. With the onscreen keyboard, you can tap individual keys or slide your finger from one letter to the next to type without lifting your finger. (See Enter text using the onscreen keyboard .)
In the sender s email, touch and hold the first word of the text, then drag to the last word. (See Select and revise text .) Tap the Reply button , tap Reply, then type your message.
